title: june 26: how the UN came to be (with Becca Mancari)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the signing of the United Nations charter. After, she’s joined by Becca Mancari! Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
